title: Kentucky regulators reject subsidy for crypto mining firm: Here’s why
description: Kentucky’s Public Service Commission recently rejected a proposal that would have granted Ebon International, a mining firm, a discounted rate on electricity for its planned crypto-mining facility in Louisa, Kentucky.
